name: Jam Maker
description:
my first game jam.

-------(you can play the game, but the final objective is broken, see bug list to find out more)-------

by some 14 year old.

My concept for this game was to big, so it is very buggy.

Bugs currently found:

----------------------------------------------

don't press e during the tutorial - you can open menu during tutorial, this messes up the cursor.

don't spam click the scientist(I think)  - weak code 

scientist speech is broken - cuz I'm dum

scientist collider is unreliable - idk why

don't spam click the pond(I think) - weak code 

pond does not work - you cannot finish the game, final objective is broken, I forgot to add the collider into it, but you can still play the game... kinda?

don't walk off the edge - I didn't add a boundary around the map, so you can probably walk forever in that direction

camera kinda buggy - idk why yet

If you encounter any more bugs comment them bellow.
